---
category: news
title: "Label-free multiplexed microtomography of endogenous subcellular dynamics using deep learning"
excerpt: "A research team upgraded the 3D microtomography observing dynamics of label-free live cells in multiplexed fluorescence imaging. The AI-powered 3D holotomographic microscopy extracts various molecular information from live unlabeled biological cells in real time without exogenous labeling or staining agents."
